title: Great Well-Kept Point Breeze 3 Bed. 1.5 Bath Home w/C/A, W/D and more!
description:
A Very well kept 3 bed 1 & 1-1/2 bath home with high ceilings, hardwood floors throughout, open floor plan, brand new washer and dryer on first floor, central A/C , wonderful private stone covered backyard space and so much more. Located in the very popular Point Breeze Section of South Philadelphia. Kitchen was recently updated with granite counter tops, a newer gas range and a new refrigerator installed. At the back of the house on the first floor there is a large pantry area with shelves and new front loading washer and dryer. 1/2 bath is off of the living room and has a charming window to the back of the house.The back yard space is flanked by beautiful distressed brick walls with a small gate that leads to the tiny alleyway for emergency exits. The basement is unfinished but dry and has high ceilings great for storage or work room / workout area. Heading to the 2nd floor you find the larger full sized bathroom with white subway tile walls and large tub at the top of the steps. The back bedroom has bay windows overlooking the private back yard area. The middle bedroom is the smaller of the 3 bedrooms but still has a closet and can fit a twin bed. Finally the primary bedroom at the front of the home bost bright sun filled windows, high ceilings and a nice sized closet. Call today to come see this very nice home that has everything a tenant could ask for. Set up your time to see this bright and fresh home today!! Cats and small dogs under 25 lbs. ok with a non-refundable pet fee. Tenant pays their own gas, electric, cable and internet, and cold water/sewer. 1 year lease minimum. $75 non-refundable application fee with Two paystubs (or some sort of income verification) and photo ID. For income, we look for 3x rent for gross monthly income. We run a credit, criminal and eviction check. No smoking. If approved, you will be charged a document preparation fee of $100.00. description:
This stunning one bedroom, one bathroom apartment in the centre of Northern Liberties offers luxury living, a great location, and a low cost. The Fountain building offers the best of both worlds thanks to its interior of historic exposed brick and beams and modern conveniences (gym, game room, secure bicycle storage, and video entry). The Piazza, Johnny Brenda's, One Shot Cafe, Cafe La Maude, Jerry's, Cantina, and many more are just a short stroll away for brunch or a night out. title: NEWLY RENOVATED ONE BEDROOM AT EMERSON APARTMENTS
description:
EMERSON APARTMENTS
We are located in the greater northeast section of Philadelphia right off of Bustleton
Avenue with Evarts as the cross street. Our apartments are fully renovated with brand
new kitchens and bathrooms! Parking lot in the rear of the building and laundry facilities on site!
Don’t miss this opportunity to find the home you will love!
We are open for viewing Monday through Friday 10:00 am to 4:00 pm.
Please give us a call to schedule an appointment. Applications are on site.
You may bring along the following so you can apply the same day:
1. The application fee in the form of a money order. The
application fee is $75. This covers up to two applicants.
Any adult moving in MUST be on the application.
2. Proof of your monthly income such as, pay stubs, SSI/SSDI award
letter or statement of pension payments. We do not accept bank
statements as proof of income. We must be able to verify your income.
3. A copy of your social security card and ID as proof of your identity.
In order to qualify for an apartment, your credit report must have no relevant
landlord tenant filings or evictions. In addition, you cannot have any kind of arrest record.
Your income needs to be two and a half times
the cost of the rent.
**You will need to make your own copies**
Once you are approved for residency, you will need to pay one month's
security to hold the apartment. An apartment takes about three to five
weeks to make ready to move in. Once the apartment is ready, we
require an additional two months of rent: first and last month's rent.
ONE BEDROOM APARTMENTS FOR $1100 PER MONTH *(Available 8/1)*
TWO BEDROOM APARTMENTS $1300 PER MONTH *(10/1)* Wheelchair accessible
-Price of rent includes gas and water. (heating, cooking and hot water included)
-$25 monthly pet fee (Cats and small dogs)

title: Available now - Move-in Ready!!
description: Available now - Move-in Ready, Traditional Mayfair Straight Thru. Additional photos to follow. Stone and Slate Front. 3 Bedrooms, 2 Full Bathrooms. Hardwood Flooring. Large Row Home offering 1300 sq. ft. Extra large Basement. Convenient to Frankford Avenue and Torresdale Avenue Shopping, walking distance to Regional Rail Train Station, I-95, community centers, schools and playgrounds. Walk up to nicely landscaped front lawn and patio, enter through Vestibule to Large Living Room with hardwood flooring , front Bay Window, offering plenty of natural lighting. Leading to Dining Room, big enough for all of your entertainment gatherings. The Eat-in Kitchen is private with ample cabinet and counterspace, dishwasher, refrigerator, oven/microwave combination. Decorative painted walls and ceiling fans. Wood banister leads to Second level with 3 large bedrooms and a 3-piece ceramic tile Bathroom with recent upgrades. Walk downstairs to the huge basement with another 3-piece bathroom. The garage has been converted into basement allowing for additional space. title: Large rooms in Renovated Victorian, Chefs Kitchen,  Huge Deck
description:
Three bedroom, 2 1/2 bathroom Victorian House a block from the trolley available 9 months starting September 1, 2022, though there is some flexibility with the dates.
This house is over 2000 square feet of living space. There is a large front porch and garden. You walk through double doors to huge family room with a orange fireplace mantel, crown molding, and inlaid wood floors. Large ornate stair case brings you up to the second floor with the bedrooms. Then you enter the dining room on a bay through french doors. First floor has a large chef's kitchen with six burner stove, granite counter tops, large kitchen island, and stainless steel appliances. There is a laundry room and half bath too. The first floor has an open floor plan, retaining many of the historic characteristics with an updated modern kitchen. The best of both worlds.
The back yard has a huge roof deck and a tree lined side garden. The side of the house also has a large garden.
This house is perfect for grad students, professors, and families. We are really strict with who we rent to because its our family house.
Large room with non-working fireplace, hardwood floors, ceiling fan, 4 windows, and desk.
Medium room with ceiling fan, hardwood floors, closet with French doors, and three windows on a bay.
Large room, 2C, with 4 windows, hardwood floors, ceiling fan, large closet, and private bathroom with tub.
Hard wood floors throughout house. Brand new bathrooms. Jacuzzi bathtub in bathroom, rain shower, stone tiles, and granite counter tops.
There is a mother in law apartment above so tenants will have the tenant walking through to her apartment.
WiFi through out the house. House is furnished.
Huge roof deck. All utilities included.
There is a house cat, Shaka Zulu that comes with the house.
Rental is from September 1, 2022 to May 29, 2023. Move in can be a bit flexible also.
Give me a call to set up an appointment.
Mike

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

title: $3,300 - 3/4 Bedroom 3 Bathroom Townhome In West Chester With Garage P
description:
**Move in Date - September 4th
Large townhome located within a half mile walking distance to downtown West Chester in the highly sought-after neighborhood of Union Station. Spanning approx. 2,800 sqft, this beautiful home is the largest model in the community. It features high-end interior designs styled with modern upgrades and plenty of room for young professionals or a family. The main living area has hardwood flooring and 9ft ceilings throughout with recessed lighting, and powder room with hardwood floors. The kitchen is highlighted by the stainless steel appliances, 7 foot marble countertop island, spreads to a dining and living room with floor to ceiling windows that open up to a 200 square foot deck with privacy barriers on both side.  The bedroom level features the Master Bedroom with walk-in closets and a designer Master Bath with tile flooring, standing shower, and double vanity sinks. This level is complete with two large bedrooms with hardwood flooring, full bathroom with tub, and high-end washer and dryer in the hallway closet. There is also a bonus room on the floor level of the house that can be used as a playroom, entertainment room, etc that is approximately 300 square feet. The oversized garage and driveway are large enough to fit two cars side by side and 4 additional cars in the driveway pending size – 4 cars fitting comfortable and possibly up to 6 cars in total between garage space and driveway.
Don't miss your chance to live in the desirable West Chester Borough! Located by the cross street of Barnard and Union street.
Owner pays HOA fee. Tenant pays utilities.

title: The open floor plan on the main level is perfect for entertaining
description:
This well maintained 2 bedroom, 2 bath home has a sunny open floor plan. The spacious kitchen is steps away from a designated dining area. Adjacent is the living room with plentiful windows and patio access. Out on the patio enjoy a peaceful natural setting. End your day in your private owner's suite with a large closet and roomy bath. The second bedroom is in the front of the home and next to the second full bath. There is also a laundry room off the kitchen which affords ample pantry space. Newly installed LVP flooring throughout. The HOA maintains the grounds giving you more time to enjoy the community pool and tennis courts. Near shopping, dining, medical plus Wilmington and area beaches!Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac in the heart of the prestigious Landfall community, this elegant home sits on almost a half acre with amazing views overlooking the #1 Hole of the Nicklaus Ocean Course. The lush landscaping provides great curb appeal and adds to the privacy. The interior of the home features four bedrooms, five baths, and two master suites--one on each level.
CALL US 40 84 18 17 58
The open floor plan on the main level is perfect for entertaining with one room flowing seamlessly into another and French doors and palladian windows throughout that offer abundant natural light. The kitchen offers ample prep and storage space and opens to the formal dining room and living room. Prepare to be amazed at the second-level master suite, boasting a marble bathroom with soaking tub and stand-up shower, and an entire room of closets. The second floor also has two additional bedrooms each with its own bathroom. Relax out back on the sweeping patio--complete with an in-ground plunge pool--and enjoy tranquil pond and golf course views as well as breathtaking sunrises and sunsets. The fenced backyard, an added perk is perfect for children and pets. The home is located in close proximity to the walking trail around Landfall Lake, Nicklaus Club House, driving range, and putting green. The gated golf community of Landfall offers many amenities and a fantastic location close to shopping, dining, and Millwright Beach.Whether Game Night in the den, or back patio barbeques & cornhole with family & friends in the large fenced backyard, you'll build memories for years to come. Other features include newer roof, newly repainted interior, new dishwasher, wood floors in bedrooms & front Living Room, LVP flooring in Dining area & Kitchen, smooth ceilings and screened porch. Popular schools: Holly Tree, Roland Grise & Hoggard. Such a convenient location, only moments from grocery stores, pharmacies, dining & shopping, and a short drive to UNCW, hospital, sandy beaches & Historic Downtown Wilmington! Make it your home, or use it as an investment property. Ready for immediate occupancy!Welcome to this FRESH unit listed in the wonderful community of Breezewood. This two bedroom, two bath condo has brand new LVP flooring throughout, beautiful granite in the kitchen, and new stainless steel appliances. Enjoy the open floor plan, covered balcony, and spacious bedrooms. The best of all?! The location.. 1.2 miles from the Pointe at Barclay, 10 minutes to downtown, 15 minutes to Wrightsville Beach. This low maintenance condo is a must see!
Conveniently located between Market St and I-40 off Gordon Rd, this gem offers a nearly new roof, great covered front porch, privacy fenced in and landscaped back yard. On the inside you'll find a large kitchen with granite counter tops, tile backsplash, painted cabinets, S/S appliances, large dining room and new LVP flooring throughout the entire house. This 1680sf 3 bedroom, 2 full bath, is beautifully decorated and is a must see. The Owner's suite is in the back of the home with two additional bedrooms in the front. The large living room is open and bright and super accessible to the kitchen which makes this space perfect for entertaining as well. Both the living room and Owner suite have vaulted ceilings. With plenty of open space there is room to move around freely. Wyck Farm is a quiet little community of 20 homes, low HOA dues, and a bunch of happy neighbors. Wrightsville beach, Mayfaire, Ogden, Porters Neck, ILM, numerous public parks, and I-40 are all nearby conveniences that make this home a great opportunity for the discerning buyer that doesn't want to spend half the day fighting traffic. Please see NCDOT site for more information pertaining to the Gordon Rd Improvements expansion/widening project.Beautiful brick ranch home in the desirable community of Country Haven! This home has a great open floor plan with a huge family room and open kitchen, eat in kitchen and a formal dining area, three beds, 2 baths, and a bonus! This property is loaded with great features including LVP flooring throughout the main living areas, granite counter tops, upgraded appliances, large cabinets, tile backsplash, a cozy fireplace, vaulted ceilings, a back deck, and more! The yard is a good size and fully fenced on all sides. Tucked back on a quiet cul de sac this property is in the perfect location! Conveniently located between Porters Neck and Ogden this home is convenient to Wrightsville Beach, Mayfair, and historic downtown Wilmington.Welcome to this beautiful home in the charming & desirable neighborhood of Rivers Edge! This home is tucked away in a cul-de-sac & draws you in with its beautiful landscaping. The backyard features a deck to relax after a long day or coffee to start your day, areas for gardening, or a spot to grill your favorite meals! This home has a privacy fence, beautiful new floors, quartz countertops, huge pantry,
open floor plan, vaulted ceilings in the living area, handicap accessible features, and much more! Nestled between The Pointe at Barclay and Riverlights, you're close to great restaurants & the movies. Enjoy staying active? You're minutes from a kayak launch & hiking/biking trails, this area has it all!Enjoy the beautiful North Carolina weather from the deck off the kitchen and living room area, or from the large screened porch, which has a lovely tongue and groove ceiling. The interior features hardwood flooring and a fireplace flanked by built-ins. Its mantle is charmingly repurposed from the original beam construction. The kitchen is updated with granite countertops, stainless-steel appliances (all appliances convey), and custom cabinetry. The second bedroom does not have a closet, but the seller will add one if the buyer requests. In the back yard is a detached shed/workshop that's wired with a 60 amp, 240 volt service typically needed for larger appliances and machines. A home warranty is included.One owner home just over the bridge from Carolina Beach backs up to undeveloped federal lands that contribute to the quiet and private atmosphere. The living area enjoys an unusual combination of filtered natural light, privacy and serenity; thanks in part to its high elevation and wooded landscape. Ground-level bonus room with full bath is offset from primary living area, great for office, in-laws or quiet space. This home's oversized garage has seen many years as a woodworking shop, while it remains functional as a garage it could also become a nice workout or creative space. The community is a welcome departure from the clear-cut modern subdivisions, mature trees and large variety of home styles are reminiscent of better times. The Cape HOA website says it best, ''The Cape residents enjoy in excess of seven miles of private streets, where friends and neighbors can be seen daily: walking together, walking their pets, running, bike riding and socializing outdoors. We have a quiet and beautiful community.'' The community has recently purchased adjoining building and land for clubhouse, pool and other amenities; seller has paid assessments and development is underway. This well cared for home looks forward to your visit, and welcoming its new owners to a lifestyle of possibilities.

description: Spacious and sun-filled corner property with incredible potential to create your dream home. At the rear of the second floor, a door takes you out onto a large second floor deck / patio.  The basement offers a spacious finished space, second full bathroom with tiled stall shower, and a large unfinished storage / utility room.
